meanings.def: connected with a large business company
examples: corporate identity (= the image of a company, which all its members share)
corporate hospitality (= when companies entertain customers to help develop good business relationships)
initiatives to improve standards of corporate governance
the prevailing mood in the boardrooms of corporate America
Their corporate headquarters are in Boston.

meanings.def: forming a corporation (= an organization or group of organizations that is recognized by law as a single unit)
examples: The BBC is a corporate organization.
The law applies both to individuals and to corporate bodies.

meanings.def: involving or shared by all the members of a group
examples: a corporate act of worship in the College chapel
